cause.description:
Many girls are willing to put Hijab, but what is keeping them from it is the way their families or friends would treat them once they do. Or you find many girls who put the Hijab on and take it off a couple of times just to satisfy a family member or a close one. I created this to support the new Mohajjabat and help them hold on to it, and also of course help myself too cuz I'm considered a new mohajjaba as well. May god bless you all.
1. It is one of the priorities of Islam
2. It shows Muslims from other people
3. It makes her closer to god
4. It makes her feel valuable and expensive
5. makes her feel special
6. People appreciate her and treat her better
7. Makes her feel calm and peacful and somewhat relieved
8. It protects her
cause.mission: Support new Mo7ajjabat and encourage them to hold on to it, despite the comments they might get from families and friends
cause.name: Support Mo7ajjabat
